title: Oregon Ducks typeface
content:
Can anyone help identify the typeface used by the Oregon ducks.   
   
 [http://goducks.fansonly.com/index-flash.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718035934/http:/goducks.fansonly.com/index-flash.html)   
   
The very topmost typeface is the one I'm looking for. The text in yellow just below that is Handel Gothic I know but I need the one at the very top.   
   
Thanks,   
Tom
author: graficartist

comments.content: kinda like handel gothic, kinda like space (www.myfonts.com)

jaxson, thanks for looking anyway.   
   
Tiffany, it's exactly like that isn't it - a cross between handel gothic and space. my searches on myfonts.com haven't given me anything new though. Thanks!
Somebody should help this poor fellow out. I wish I could. Good luck, Bro.
